rubrics.rubric: Urticaria - chronic, recurring at same time daily
Boils - extremely painful, sensitive to touch
Boils - with tendency to form abscesses
Boils - that discharge thin offensive pus
Boils - that do not heal easily
Acne - with oily skin and large pores
Herpes - with itching followed by burning
Eczema - < warmth of bed or bathing
Eczema - with intense itching, bleeding on scratching
Eczema - in bends of joints (antecubital, popliteal)
Ringworm - circular patches with clear center
Psoriasis - with intense itching and burning
Xerosis - dry, rough skin with scaling
Xerosis - < in elderly or thin persons
Lichen planus - < stress or emotional strain
Lichen planus - oral involvement (mouth ulcers, burning)
Lichen planus - < night, < warmth of bed
Lichen planus - with scaling and pigmentation
Contact dermatitis - itching, redness, and burning
Contact dermatitis - blistering or oozing eruptions
Contact dermatitis - < warm water or bathing
Contact dermatitis - with chronic lichenification (thickened skin)
Contact dermatitis - < change of weather or humidity
Eczema - dry, cracked skin with itching
Eczema - children, with itching and scratching till bleeding
Vitiligo - white depigmented patches on skin
Vitiligo - associated with hormonal changes (menses, pregnancy)
Vitiligo - < family history of autoimmune diseases
Vitiligo - white depigmented patches on skin
Vitiligo - associated with hormonal changes (menses, pregnancy)
Vitiligo - < family history of autoimmune diseases
Vitiligo - white depigmented patches on skin
Vitiligo - associated with hormonal changes (menses, pregnancy)
Vitiligo - < family history of autoimmune diseases
Tinea - circular ring-shaped eruptions with itching
Tinea - with dry, scaly eruptions and thick crusts
Tinea - eruptions behind ears, scalp, groins
Tinea - recurring eruptions, suppressed in past
Tinea - intense itching with scratching till bleeding
Lichen sclerosus - white, atrophic patches (esp. genitals)
Lichen sclerosus - painful fissures, burning, dryness
Lichen sclerosus - autoimmune tendency or family history
Lichen sclerosus - associated with suppressed eruptions or grief
Hyperpigmentation - associated with dryness and rough skin
Pityriasis versicolor - scaly, discolored patches (mostly trunk, shoulders)
Pityriasis - itching or burning with scaling
Pityriasis - recurrent in humid weather or summer
Pityriasis - dry, flaky eruptions with no sensation
Pityriasis versicolor - scaly, discolored patches (mostly trunk, shoulders)
Pityriasis - itching or burning with scaling
Pityriasis - recurrent in humid weather or summer
Pityriasis - dry, flaky eruptions with no sensation
Ichthyosis - cracked, bleeding skin with scaling
Ichthyosis - thickened skin on palms and soles
Seborrheic dermatitis - oily, scaly eruptions on scalp, eyebrows, or face
Seborrheic dermatitis - yellowish, greasy scales with itching
Seborrheic dermatitis - worse in winter or cold weather
Seborrheic dermatitis - with cracked, fissured skin behind ears or in folds
Erysipelas/Cellulitis - red, hot, swollen skin with burning and stinging
Erysipelas - with shiny, tense, edematous skin
Cellulitis - with pus formation or abscess
Skin complaints - < undressing or exposure to air
Skin - itching > scratching, but followed by burning
Skin complaints - < during spring or rainy season
Skin complaints - < motion or physical exertion
Skin eruptions - < from anger or emotional excitement
Skin - bleeds easily from slightest scratch or touch
Skin discharge - bloody (with ulcers or cracks)
Skin eruptions - between fingers or toes
Skin - horny growths / hard thick crusts
Skin - eruptions alternating with asthma / diarrhea

keyPoints.description: Rhus tox and Mezereum are top for vesicular eruptions that itch and burn intensely.
Graphites and Petroleum are excellent for cracked, oozing, or fissured skin, especially in cold weather.
Sulphur is a master remedy for burning, itching, and offensive skin eruptions worse at night.
Thuja and Causticum are commonly used for various forms of warts, especially on hands or genitals.
Psorinum is deep-acting in chronic eczema with dirty, offensive skin and severe night itching.
Apis and Urtica urens are top for urticaria with intense burning, redness, and < heat.
Urtica urens covers shellfish-related urticaria, red wheals, and recurring patterns.
Sulphur and Psorinum aggravate after bathing and in chronic itchy urticaria.
Ignatia and Natrum mur are helpful when urticaria is triggered by suppressed emotions.
Hepar sulph is highly sensitive to touch and helps hasten suppuration in boils.
Silicea helps chronic boils and promotes expulsion of pus or foreign bodies.
Echinacea and Myristica are great for septic boils with poor healing.
Mercurius and Arsenicum work well for foul-smelling discharges and unhealthy skin.
Boils recurring around menses point to Sepia or Pulsatilla.
Kali bromatum is specific for adolescent acne with bluish-red pustules and scarring.
Hepar sulph and Silicea are great for painful, pus-filled acne with tendency to form boils.
Sepia and Pulsatilla help acne related to hormonal changes during menses.
Sulphur and Natrum mur are best when acne is oily, recurring, and worsened by sweets.
Natrum mur is a top remedy for recurring herpes labialis or genitalis, especially < sun or stress.
Mezereum is very effective in herpes with intense itching followed by burning, especially < touch.
Rhus tox is suited for herpes with clustered vesicles, especially when < damp weather or cold air.
Arsenicum and Apis are indicated in herpes with burning, stinging pain and restlessness.
Graphites is suited for moist, crusty eczema, especially behind ears or joint folds.
Petroleum is key for eczema < winter, with painful cracks and extreme dryness.
Sulphur is excellent for eczema with night itching and < bathing or warmth.
Psorinum covers dirty-looking skin, foul odor, and aggravation after scratching.
Thuja is the most commonly indicated remedy in all types of warts, especially moist, cauliflower-like or genital.
Nitric acid is indicated in warts that bleed easily, are sensitive and painful to touch.
Causticum covers flat or pedunculated warts, especially around nails or that bleed on touch.
Sabina and Sepia are suited to warts arising or worsening during hormonal phases like pregnancy.
Tellurium is highly effective in circular ringworm with clear center and < heat/sweat.
Sepia suits chronic or recurring ringworm, especially on scalp or in children.
Psorinum is indicated in offensive-smelling, itchy, recurring fungal skin eruptions.
Graphites helps when ringworm coexists with eczema or crust formation.
Graphites is top for dry, cracked skin with thick scales and bleeding on scratching.
Arsenicum album covers burning, itching psoriasis with restlessness and < cold.
Petroleum suits dry psoriasis < winter, with painful cracks and < bathing.
Psorinum works well for dirty-looking, offensive-smelling, chronic psoriasis < night.
Sulphur addresses itching, redness, scaling < heat and < bathing.
Mezereum is top remedy for shingles with intense burning, neuralgic pains and post-herpetic pain.
Rhus toxicodendron is suited for herpes zoster < cold, < night, > warmth, with restless feeling.
Hypericum helps in neuralgic pains following shingles, especially shooting along nerves.
Lachesis for left-sided shingles, and Lycopodium for right-sided eruptions.
Petroleum is top remedy for extremely dry, cracked skin < winter, < washing.
Graphites suits xerosis with fissures, cracks, oozing and bleeding areas.
Sulphur covers intense itching, heat, dryness < bathing or warm room.
Psorinum for dirty, itchy, dry skin worse in cold and at night.
Arsenicum album indicated in aged, chilly patients with burning and dry skin.
Arsenicum album is suited for lichen planus with burning, restlessness, < night, < stress.
Sulphur addresses intense itching, < night, with papular, scaling eruptions.
Graphites works for chronic, scaly lichen planus with pigmentation.
Natrum mur and Ignatia useful when emotional factors trigger or worsen the condition.
Thuja for warty or ulcerative forms, especially with genital involvement.
Graphites is suited to contact dermatitis with thick, cracked, oozing eruptions < soaps, < winter.
Rhus toxicodendron covers vesicular eruptions with intense itching and blistering < washing.
Sulphur works for itching, burning, dry skin conditions < heat, < bathing.
Petroleum helps when skin is very dry, cracked, or worsened by detergents and winter.
Mezereum for oozing eruptions, with burning and < scratching or warmth.
Graphites is key for dry, cracked, thickened eczema with honey-like oozing.
Sulphur suits itching, burning eczema < night, < heat, < bathing.
Petroleum is excellent for winter eczema with fissures, cracks, and < washing.
Psorinum helps in recurring eczema with < winter, < bathing, < suppressed eruptions.
Chamomilla and Calcarea for restless children with intense itching and bleeding eruptions.
Arsenicum album for vitiligo with itching or burning, < winter, < anxiety.
Sulphur is suited for chronic skin conditions with dryness, suppressed eruptions, < heat.
Sepia for hormonally triggered vitiligo or with menstrual disturbances.
Psorinum and Medorrhinum useful when vitiligo follows suppression or has miasmatic history.
Natrum mur and Ignatia for stress-triggered or grief-related onset of vitiligo.
Cantharis covers large, painful blisters with raw surfaces, intense burning, < touch.
Mezereum suits pustular or bullous eruptions with burning, thick crusts, < night.
Sulphur addresses chronic, burning, foul-smelling skin disorders with < heat.
Psorinum and Medorrhinum indicated in autoimmune, relapsing forms or post-suppression.
Borax and Nitric acid for mucous membrane erosions with burning pain.
Tuberculinum suits ulcerative or recurring lupus with family TB history or suppressed eruptions.
Sepia is indicated in facial butterfly rash, < sun, < hormonal stress.
Arsenicum album suits ulcerative lupus with burning, < cold, < night.
Silicea helps in indurated, slow-healing lupus with cold aggravation and disfigurement.
Kali iodatum addresses deep ulceration with yellow crusts, < night.
Tellurium is specific for ring-shaped lesions with offensive odor and < night.
Sulphur suits itching, burning tinea with < heat, < bathing, < suppression.
Graphites for scaly, moist tinea with cracks and eruptions behind ears.
Psorinum covers suppressed, recurring tinea with < damp weather and foul discharges.
Sepia and Mezereum useful when eruptions are dry, thick, and appear in folds or scalp.
Sepia is most suited in genital lichen sclerosis with dryness, < sexual activity, < washing.
Borax addresses painful mucosal dryness and soreness, < touch, < washing.
Thuja suits autoimmune-related mucosal atrophy or warts-like texture.
Psorinum and Medorrhinum cover deep miasmatic layers with suppressed skin issues.
Nitric acid and Kreosotum help with fissured, painful mucosa with bleeding or burning.
Tellurium suits discolored scaly patches on trunk, < sweat, < bathing.
Sulphur is ideal for itchy, scaling eruptions < heat, < night, < bathing.
Kali sulphuricum helps in dry, flaking eruptions without itching.
Graphites helps in flaky, dry pityriasis with cracks and no itching.
Psorinum covers recurrent pityriasis with suppressed history and < winter.
Sepia is top remedy for melasma, hormonal pigmentation, < during menses or sun exposure.
Sulphur suits dirty, blotchy skin with roughness, < warmth, < suppression.
Natrum mur addresses pigmentation from grief, sun, or chronic headaches.
Graphites suits dry, rough skin with discoloration post-inflammation.
Cadmium sulph is useful in persistent, toxic-induced pigmentation (e.g., chemo).
Tellurium suits discolored scaly patches on trunk, < sweat, < bathing.
Sulphur is ideal for itchy, scaling eruptions < heat, < night, < bathing.
Kali sulphuricum helps in dry, flaking eruptions without itching.
Graphites helps in flaky, dry pityriasis with cracks and no itching.
Psorinum covers recurrent pityriasis with suppressed history and < winter.
Petroleum is a top remedy for excessively dry, cracked skin < winter, < bathing.
Graphites helps with cracked, rough skin and fissures, especially in folds and behind ears.
Alumina suits dry, non-elastic skin with constipation and sluggishness.
Psorinum and Tuberculinum cover inherited ichthyosis with suppressed eruptions.
Sulphur is broadly useful in dirty, scaling, dry skin < warmth, < wool.
Graphites suits thick, sticky eruptions with cracks behind ears and greasy scales.
Kali sulphuricum for yellow, oily scales especially on scalp or eyebrows.
Petroleum for < winter, dry and fissured skin with offensive discharge.
Sulphur suits itchy, greasy eruptions aggravated by heat and wool.
Sanicula suits dirty-looking skin with itching < bathing, < perspiration.
Apis is top remedy for red, swollen, burning, shiny skin < heat and touch.
Rhus tox suits erysipelas with vesicles, < rest, > warmth, restlessness.
Belladonna suits sudden intense redness with throbbing and high fever.
Cantharis covers blistering erysipelas with burning, raw sensation.
Hepar sulph and Silicea help when cellulitis becomes suppurative (pus).
Sulphur is most commonly indicated for < heat, < bathing, < wool, and itching < in bed.
Hepar sulph works in painful, sensitive eruptions that < touch, < cold, and suppurate easily.
Psorinum is highly chilly, dirty looking skin, < cold, < bathing, and < heat.
Mezereum suits eruptions with violent itching and burning < scratching.
Apis and Ars cover < heat, < touch, > cold, burning, and stinging skin.
Sulphur and Psorinum are worse at night and from sweating, itching violently.
Rhus tox and Dulcamara are worse in rainy or damp weather, especially skin eruptions.
Hepar sulph and Silicea are worse from cold applications, helpful in boils and abscesses.
Lachesis and Mercurius bleed easily on scratching, useful in purpura and ulcerative skin lesions.
Hepar sulph and Mercurius are common in yellow or green purulent discharges, often offensive.
Graphites is key for sticky, gluey, thick discharges with cracked skin.
Psorinum and Tarentula have very offensive, foul-smelling skin discharges.
Lachesis and Nitric acid cover bleeding discharges, especially in ulcerated or fissured skin.
Petroleum, Graphites, and Sulphur are leading in dry, cracked, bleeding skin with rawness.
Psorinum and Caladium show itching without eruptions, worse from warmth.
Silicea and Hepar-s are important when skin easily ulcerates or forms pus from minor injuries.
Arsenicum, Cantharis, and Lachesis are key in burning or highly sensitive inflamed skin.
Graphites and Petroleum are commonly indicated in eruptions in flexures, behind ears, and groins.
Silicea and Sulphur are versatile and appear across multiple skin locations like scalp, feet, and limbs.
Thuja and Nit-ac are frequently indicated in genital and intertriginous area skin eruptions.
Mezereum is well-suited for scalp, back, and moist vesicular eruptions.
Thuja, Silicea, and Mezereum are highly indicated for skin issues after vaccination.
Psorinum and Sulphur are important for suppressed eruptions and alternating skin complaints.
Agaricus and Zincum cover crawling, tingling sensations on skin.
Graphites and Fluoric acid are useful when skin has thick crusts or painful old scars.
